original_text: And they told him all the words of Joseph, which he had said unto them: and when he saw the wagons which Joseph had sent to carry him, the spirit of Jacob their father revived:
korean_text: 그들이 또 요셉이 자기들에게 부탁한 모든 말로 그에게 말하매 그들의 아버지 야곱은 요셉이 자기를 태우려고 보낸 수레를 보고서야 기운이 소생한지라

sentences.original_text: And they told him all the words of Joseph
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 요셉의 모든 말을 그에게 이르렀습니다

sentences.original_text: which he had said unto them:
and when he saw the wagons
which Joseph had sent to carry him,
the spirit of Jacob their father revived:
